fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Budget, Trade, Customs, Single market, Food Safety
eu_initiatives:
- Dairy policy, in particular market measures such as public intervention and private storage aid 
- CAP reform post 2020  
- Trade mechanisms review 
- Participation in the milk market observatory 
- Brexit 
- Unfair trading practices and supply chain regulation 
- Implementation of the food information regulation 
- Functioning of the EU single market for dairy products 
- Work on various FTA negotiations, e.g Japan, Mercosur Mexico, and Indonesia   
- Monitoring of the implementation of existing agreements (South Korea, Colombia-Peru, Central America, Canada, Singapore) 
- Market access issues in third countries (SPS, TBT)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Expert Group Milk Market Observatory#E03037#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3037#Member#C#Advisory Group on the Food Chain and Animal and Plant Health#E00860#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=860#Not a member#C#Animal Health Advisory Committee#Expert Group on agricultural commodity derivatives and spot markets#E02834#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2834#Member#C
membership: CELCAA (European Liaison Committee for Agricultural and Agri-Food Trade)
goals__remit:
EUCOLAIT is the association representing the interests of European dairy trade. It was founded in 1959 and today has members in 16 EU Member States as well as associate members outside the EU. Some 500 companies active in intra-EU and international dairy trade are either direct or indirect members of EUCOLAIT. 
 
EUCOLAIT provides information to its members on issues pertinent to their activity such as the EU agricultural and trade policy, food law as well as on market developments. We also promote the interests of our members towards the EU institutions, our ultimate goal being to ensure that trade with dairy products can take place without undue obstacles and to help in creating more business opportunities for our members. 
 
EUCOLAIT is also a platform for discussion and meetings for European and international dairy trade companies. Our meetings offer high quality dairy related information and facilitate the development of closer professional links between companies.
relevant_communication:
- Organisation of three main events per year (two in Brussels and the General Assembly always in a different location) focusing on market and relevant policy developments. EU officials are often invited.  
- Organisation of workshops on the prospects for EU dairy markets to reinforce the dialogue between our members and DG AGRI. 
- Organisation of events to promote the development of dairy futures  
- Enhancing the tailor-made information service for our members
